name: cmsmasters-custom-cursor
description: Build tools for Custom Cursor addon

scripts.build: npm run min:js && npm run min:css
scripts.min:js: terser assets/lib/custom-cursor/custom-cursor.js -o assets/lib/custom-cursor/custom-cursor.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/navigator-indicator.js -o assets/js/navigator-indicator.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/cursor-editor-sync.js -o assets/js/cursor-editor-sync.min.js -c -m
